Welcome!

Sam Struthers is currently a staff member at the ROSS lab at CSU.

His research is currently focusing on the water quality impacts of the Cameron Peak Wildfire and maintaining the Lower Poudre Sonde Network.

To learn more about the ROSS lab's research \<<https://rossyndicate.com/>\>\
